'''Jacob''' is the husband of [[Lila (All of Me)|Lila]].

==History==
Jacob was getting married when his fiancée, Lila's, mother collapsed at the start of the ceremony. She was rushed to the hospital and had surgery. She survived the surgery and when Lila and Jacob visited her in her hospital room, she insisted that the wedding should go on. The wedding commenced and Lila's mother watched on a tablet.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married to [[Lila (All of Me)|Lila]].
